TopicTitle: Game started in widescreen, upon opening widescreen game reverted to old AR

Articles.Content:
Upon opening in 1.0 the game started in widescreen, I altered nothing in the settings menu. Upon exiting the game changed aspect ratios to the old one. Don't know how to undo.

-Argon

Easily fixed. The game does start in a widescreen ratio window first time on a clean install, but for some reason that's not reflected in the screen resolution shown when you first open the "Settings" screen inside the game. That screen defaults to 1024x768 (4:3 old TV ratio) the first time. As soon as you Apply/Accept something in Settings, it changes the game to the displayed 1024x768 choice. Just pick a wide screen ratio (e.g. 1280x800, 1344x844, 1900x1200, etc), and all should be good.

I can confirm I've seen the bug. Easy workaround.

^ Thanks, I'm running the 2280x1800 retina mac, which is an odd ratio. This helps a lot.
